name: screen_change.zh
author: grayswandir
info: A very simple bit of code that lets you test if the screen changed during this frame. Just put ScreenChange_Update() in your main loop, and then ScreenChanged and DMapChanged will be updated to be true on the frames where those changes happen.
description: A very simple bit of code that lets you test if the screen changed during this frame. Just put ScreenChange_Update() in your main loop, and then ScreenChanged and DMapChanged will be updated to be true on the frames where those changes happen.
setup:
Code
Call ScreenChange_Update() in your main loop, preferably right after the call to Waitframe().
